Audioclip

Totally gnarly library for playing audio clips.

Create audioclip play functions from your remote sound files.

1 var snare = audioclip ('/path/to/your/awesome/snare/clip.mp3');
2 
3 // :: boom, clap!
4 snare();

Timing and Scheduling

Specify how long to skip, how long to play, and how long to wait before playing any clip.

1 var boombass = audioclip('/boombass.ogg');
2 boombass(delay, offset, duration);
 

2.00seconds

2.00seconds

2.00seconds

 

Syncing plays

Multiple audioclips can be made to play in sync with each other, each with its own scheduling of when it plays.
Coordination of the play schedules can be controlled together using a bpm measure.

 1 var cabinet = audioclip.createCabinet();
 2 
 3 cabinet.clip('hihat', 'hihat.mp3').beat(0, 1, 2, 5/2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 13/2, 7);
 4 cabinet.clip('kick', 'kick.mp3').beat(0, 3/2, 7/2, 9/2, 11/2);
 5 cabinet.clip('snare', 'snare.mp3').beat(2, 3, 6, 28/4, 29/4, 30/4, 31/4);
 6 
 7 // set bpm
 8 cabinet.bpm(216);
 9 
10 cabinet.play();
 

216

 

Check it out!
